subject: Procurement of fee collecting agencies through Open Competitive Bidding System
text: 9Tr4 7cfy TTTHT gfararut THNY Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (wgr 4ae7t 3 rrafi T7rrT4) 94H Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QA. Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) Wa 6, Hder-10, ETGT;, T fearft 110 075 NHAI / 1S81836 eaatps-tDwakalNeg Delhid19o8-09 3rd Nov,2009 CIRCULAR NO:NHAILCQMMERCIAL QPERATIONS _ 110 Sub:: Procurement of fee collecting agencies through Open Competitive Bidding System. The  proposal for  tolling of NHAI funded sections through Auction by calling competitive bids instead of only DGR agencies is being re-examined. Therefore in the light of above, circular No NHAI / Comercial Operation/ 109 dt 21.10.2009 is kept in abeyance till appropriate decision is taken by the Hon'able Minister (RT&H) in this regard. NOTE: -- By the time further directions are issued, the collection through DGR agencies will continue and earlier directions in this regard will be followed. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 46o1A 2 +V Rajesh Poonia General Manager (CO) To All RO/ PIU's/CMU's to: 1 All Members/ CGMs/ CVO 2. All GMs 3_ PS to Chairman 4_ Director (Self Employment) Director General Resettlement, Government of India, Ministry of Defence, New Delhi 5_ Librarian HT U M NHAL #-5  Copy
